title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 118.7 - Briefs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 118.7 - Briefs

State Regulations

The time, form and procedure for the filing of briefs and
other memoranda shall be within the sole discretion of the hearing
officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
118.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
